item.title: My paper has accepted to appear in the EuroSys2020
item.description: The last research paper I wrote before joining my current team, has been accepted to be presented by the EuroSys'20. The title of the paper is “An HTM-Based Update-side Synchronization for RCU on NUMA systems”.

item.title: I will have a talk at the Hotstorage'19
item.description: HotStorage'19 에 제출한 제 최근 연구에 대한 논문이 accept 되어 7월에 해당 워크샵에서 이에 대한 내용을 발표하게 되었습니다. 논문 제목은 “Automating Context Based Access Pattern Hint Injection for System Performance and Swap Storage Durability” 입니다.

item.title: The Paper about GCMA Accepted to TC
item.description:
A paper about GCMA project has accepted to a top-level computer science journal, Transactions on Computers[1]. It will be published soon.

[1] https://www.computer.org/web/tc
